    • Uses of ManiacException in de.fu_berlin.maniac.exception

      Subclasses of ManiacException in de.fu_berlin.maniac.exception 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MalformedPacketException
      This exception occurs, when the packet type is neither of A, D, B, W or C or if the data in the packet is useless.
      class  NegativeBidException
      This exception occurs when you try to send a negative bid.
